title: Managing stress. Part II: What the world dishes out
brief_description: Details stresses that can evoke health threatening responses including loss of self esteem, boredom, role conflicts, excessive responsibility, lack of control and work overload. Demonstrates deep breathing and meditation techniques for temporarily relieving stress and prevention through cognitive restructuring.
